channel.title: Run Server Error
channel.description:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException : 17 at ItemHandler.LoadItemList<ItemHandler.java:346> at ItemHandlet.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39> at server.main<server.java:28>
i added bronze boots, bronze platebody and bronze platelegs, then i edited the bonus but the compile was fine but then i clicked 'run server' and this came up. It is also stopping other people from logging in.

item.title: Run Server Error
item.dc:creator: @mossboiyy mossboiyy
item.description:
@mossboiyy wrote:

on my server there is ‘silab’ bronze and normal bronze which one should i use?

Read full topic

item.title: Run Server Error
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

[quote=“mossboiyy, post:4, topic:183291”][quote author=`Rich link=topic=244970.msg2067611#msg2067611 date=1203550251]
Did you use spaces instead of tabs?
[/quote]
nope i didn’t[/quote]

Well do ctrl f and type in bronze boots and w\e other ones you have and if you already have them in there, take the new ones out and edit the bonuses on the other ones…

Read full topic
